name: Urban Scrawl - Contact Photo Festival Exhibit
description:
Welcome to Urban Scrawl - an exhibit in the 2025 Contact Photo Festival by Toronto photographer Henry VanderSpek.

Urban Scrawl features a series of unique images of messages written on Toronto streets, captured between 2012 and 2025 by art and documentary photographer Henry VanderSpek. The messages in the exhibit range from activist and political â€“ many dealing with the rapid changes happening in Toronto - to deeply heartfelt, to inspirational and motivational.
